panels.title: Panel Title

targets.query: SELECT last("StorageEfficiency"), last("HealthStatus"), last("PercentFree") FROM "ps_vdisk_info" WHERE ("clustername" =~ /^$Cluster$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "FriendlyName"
SELECT "Avg._sec/Read" FROM "cluster_csv_fs" WHERE ("clustername" =~ /^$Cluster$/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
SELECT last("Value") FROM "socket_listener_CLUSTERPERF" WHERE ("MetricId" = 'Volume.IOPS.Read,Volume=S2D-N1') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(0)
SELECT last("Value") FROM "ps_cluster_perf" WHERE ("MetricId" = 'Volume.IOPS.Write,Volume=S2D-N1') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(0)
SELECT last("Write_Bytes_persec") FROM "CSV_FS" WHERE ("host" = 'S2D-N1') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(0)
SELECT last("Write_Bytes_persec") FROM "CSV_FS" WHERE ("host" = 'S2D-N2') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(0)
SELECT last("PercentComplete") FROM "ps_storage_job" WHERE $timeFilter AND  ("clustername" =~ /^$Cluster$/) AND "PercentComplete" < 100 GROUP BY "name"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "win_system" WITH KEY = "clustername"
list.name: Cluster
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "win_system" WITH KEY = "clustername"
